sub_title: Customer Service Team Lead - Spanish & Italian Market
summary: People oriented and proven motivator, I love to create connections with my team and build a level of trust that pushes us together to reach our goals. Very interested in Social Media, new technologies and their application in today's working environment.

projects.title: Wall Master Project
projects.description: I was the Project Manager on this one. This project consisted in identifying the current procedures to handle the incoming messages in KLM's Facebook page to improve its handling and provide with guidelines on how to optimize our resources in order to do so. It also included some presentations to inform the team about it and to encourage them to embrace these guidelines, the content of it was also shared in the company's intranet.

contributors.headline: Customer Service Team Lead - Spanish & Italian Market

profile_positions.title: Customer Service Team Lead - Spanish & Italian Market

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I've been responsible of the Social Care team at Booking.com. On top of my previous competencies as a Team Lead CS Guest, here are some of the additional competencies of this role:

- Recruit multilingual team of Social Care Specialists and setup training and guidelines for them. Provide coaching on the spot to make sure that replies are aligned with brand's targets. Manage individual performance and team performance to create a positive environment on which Specialists can succeed. 
- Together with Marketing, constantly review Tone of Voice guidelines to ensure customer satisfaction. Deliver training to different parts of the business to align our brand response in all channels.
- Work together with Sprinklr in developing their CRM tool to fit our needs. Create reports to monitor key performance KPIs and new dashboards and rules to optimize the distribution and prioritization of the workload for the team. On board new users on the platform and manage their user groups/rights. 
- Coordinate with Marketing the engagement and response to new campaigns advertisement on Social platforms.
- Analyze performance and current needs of the Social Care division and connect with key stakeholders to develop a long term strategy for Social Care within Booking.com.
- Manage escalations and threats to brand reputation, connecting with key stakeholders in PR and Security to coordinate a response via Social Media.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Social Media CS

profile_positions.description:
My key tasks in this role are:

- To support my team’s development and own their engagement
- To set and achieve relevant and ambitious targets for our business scope
- To ensure our partner and customer satisfaction through meeting SLA’s and delivering quality results
- To own, drive and achieve global / local initiatives within your area of focus when required
- To build and maintain effective relationships with your immediate and extended colleagues in order to deliver results
- To evaluate business opportunities and promote them to the relevant team
- To create a culture that reflects the Booking values
- To translate and implement the company message, strategy and priorities into daily operations
- To be an ambassador of change and bring my team on board with a positive approach and attitude.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead Customer Service Guest

profile_positions.description:
As a Team Lead, I am part of the management team and perform multiple tasks. My main responsibilities are:

- People management: I create genuine relations of trust with my agents by being directly involved in their development process. 

- Hiring process: I am in charge of hiring new staff members. With the support of HR, I conduct interviews and monitor the new hires in training about their development and needs during the trial period.

- Operational control: I safeguard the operational targets together with the Traffic Controller by dividing the daily workload. I take deliberated decisions on issues that impact the operation and monitor agents'​ execution in order to optimize their performance. I provide reports to my Operation Manager in order to keep track of the evolution of my agents and the operation itself. 

- Agent support: I train and coach the agents to improve their product knowledge and the quality of their performance. I provide daily support and advice regarding customer service, reservations and sales, online reputation, escalations and engagement. I'm also responsible of monitoring the quality of the replies of my agents and suggest possible alternatives to increase customer satisfaction.

- Process control & continuous improvement: I monitor closely the processes and procedures, in order to signal and take action upon malfunctions and propose improvements.

- Lean ambassador and Process Owner (in cooperation with Ops Manager and Business Development): I am promoting, assessing and controlling the improvements of the Social Media processes within the department following the Lean Six Sigma principles of continuous improvement and defect elimination.

- Account manager: together with my fellow teamleads I'm responsible to monitor the different Social Media channels in order to identify trends, possible improvements or campaign oportunities.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead KLM Social Media at Cygnific

profile_positions.description:
As a Mentor, I was responsible of the agent support and their coaching, in order to improve their performance. My main responsibilities were:

- People management: I create genuine relations of trust with my agents by being directly involved in their development process. 

- Agent support: I train and coach the agents to improve their product knowledge and the quality of their performance. I provide daily support and advice regarding customer service, reservations and sales, online reputation, escalations and engagement. I'm also responsible of monitoring the quality of the replies of my agents and suggest possible alternatives to increase customer satisfaction.

- Process control & continuous improvement: I monitor closely the processes and procedures, in order to signal and take action upon malfunctions and propose improvements.
profile_positions.title: Mentor KLM Social Media at Cygnific

profile_positions.description:
- First point of contact for KLM customers in Social Media channels. 
- Advanced airline business knowledge. 
- Advanced reservations & sales management in AMADEUS reservation system. 
- Advanced KLM product knowledge and promotion. 
- Advanced online reputation management and user engagement. 
- Facebook and Twitter engagement expertise. 
- Direct contact with media relations, escalation techniques and viral post creation techniques. 
- Salesƒorce platform
- Supervised improvement owner for process implementation. 
- Coach on the floor, coach on the spot and one-on-one coach for new agents. 
- Real-time Social Media monitoring and decision taking regarding strategies to meet the team targets.
profile_positions.title: Senior Social Media Representative
